text: Surauli Buzurg, is a village under Sumerpur block, Uttar Pradesh in India. It is near the bank of Yamuna river. ==Education== The village has a primary school. ==Gallery== File:Gangeshwar Temple, Surauli Buzurg 01.jpg|Gangeshwar Temple File:Villagers from Surauli Buzurg 01.jpg|Villagers File:Villager of Surauli Buzurg 2.jpg|Villager File:Primary school, Buzurg 01.jpg|Primary school, Surauli Buzurg File:Primary school, Buzurg 01 2.jpg|Primary school building ==References== Category:Uttar Pradesh
title: Surauli Buzurg
